prompt.description: Required. The prompt for image generation.

resolution.description: Optional. The resolution of the video, only these values are allowed, 480p, 720p, 1080p.

duration.description: Optional. The duration of the video in seconds, only these values are allowed, 5, 10.

camerafixed.description: Optional. Whether to control the camera not moved.

image_name.description: Optional; The name of the image to control as the first frame.

aspect_ratio.description: Optional. The aspect ratio of the video, only these values are allowed, 1:1, 16:9, 4:3, 3:4, 9:16.
